statements: SELECT * FROM DataRetention_policies
SELECT policy_id, data_type FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE duration > 10
SELECT delete_after, data_type, duration FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE data_type = 'Sensitive'
SELECT policy_id, duration, delete_after FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE data_type LIKE 'Financial%' ORDER BY policy_id DESC
SELECT * FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE duration BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY delete_after ASC
SELECT * FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE duration > 365 ORDER BY delete_after DESC
SELECT policy_id, data_type FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE data_type='customer_data'
SELECT policy_id, duration, delete_after FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE data_type='billing_data' ORDER BY duration ASC
SELECT * FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE duration < 180 AND delete_after < '2022-09-01'
SELECT policy_id, data_type, duration FROM DataRetention_policies WHERE duration BETWEEN 90 AND 180
SELECT name, dob FROM personal_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM personal_info WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, address FROM personal_info WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, dob FROM personal_info WHERE dob > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, address FROM personal_info WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period > 5 AND policy_name LIKE '%backup%';
SELECT policy_id AS ID, description AS Details FROM data_retention_policy ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, street, city, postal_code, country FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT phone_number, credit_card_number FROM personal_data WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT id, user_id, last_login FROM personal_data ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users;
SELECT street, city, postal_code FROM addresses ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT phone_number, credit_card_number, last_login FROM personal_data WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '1234%';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT u.name, p.phone_number, a.city FROM users u JOIN personal_data p ON u.id = p.user_id JOIN addresses a ON u.id = a.user_id ORDER BY u.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, address, phone_number FROM personal_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM deletion_logs WHERE deleted_by = 'Admin' ORDER BY deleted_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, p.address FROM users u JOIN personal_details p ON u.id = p.user_id;
SELECT d.policy_name, d.retention_period, l.deleted_at FROM data_retention_policy d LEFT JOIN deletion_logs l ON d.id = l.id;
SELECT u.username, d.policy_description FROM users u, data_retention_policy d WHERE u.id = d.id AND u.date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_personal_info;
SELECT id, name, email FROM user_personal_info;
SELECT user_id, address FROM user_addresses;
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM user_payments;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_personal_info;
SELECT name, email FROM user_personal_info ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT u.name, a.address FROM user_personal_info u JOIN user_addresses a ON u.id = a.user_id;
SELECT p.card_number, p.expiration_date, u.name FROM user_payments p JOIN user_personal_info u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT r.policy_name, r.retention_period, r.action FROM retention_policies r WHERE r.action = 'delete';
